title: Noida dhaba owner, waiter stabbed over delay in serving salad
selftext: The incident took place at around 10 pm on Thursday at ‘Vishal Hotel’ in Achchheja in Badalpur police station area, said officials. The two accused have been identified as Amit Kumar and Sanjay Singh.
comments: Good that people have started caring about fibre in their diet.
